Introduction
This topic contains general information on requests for Federal records, including
Department of Veterans Affairs' (VAâ€™s) responsibility to assist claimants in obtaining evidence
electronic requests for records from a Federal entity
written requests for records to a Federal entity
requesting outpatient treatment records (OPTRs) from a military treatment facility (MTF)
obtaining records from a Vet Center
reviewing for and obtaining records from the Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) activity
, and
final notification to claimants that VA is unable to obtain relevant Federal records
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Requesting Evidence From Federal Record Custodians
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
